quest_desc.qdesc: 1. 제레인트와 대화로 이어져 시작. 해당 레벨에 왕성 병사 클림드와 대화. 2. 해적들의 동굴에서 부상당한 정예병사와 대화. 3. 주교에게 보고.

talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>

$Injured Elite$
Argh... *Gasp*...
(It seems like he is having trouble speaking because of a severe injury.)

$Geraint$
The only ones here right now are a sleeping girl and a non-human being.
I think you belong more to the vibrant outside world.

$Elite Soldier$
I still have 50 pages of letters of apologies left to write for the incident at Calderock.
When will I finish this... Sigh..

$Injured Soldier$
Argh... *Gasp*...
(It seems like he is having trouble speaking because of a severe injury.)

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
Move away, being beside you make me look bad.
Just go over there and play with that raccoon Bishop!

$King Cassius$
D-did the Prophet... Did the Prophet wake up yet...?
I-is this because of my lack of virtue...? I-it isn't, is it...?

$Duke Stuart${action:Stand2}
If we would like to make the virtue of our young King be known to the poor people who are shivering with anxiety, we should make good use of the Gold Dragon, as well as the Prophet.

$General Douglas$
It looks like Bishop Ignacio is busy these days.
With you helping out, I feel more relax.

$Bishop Ignacio$
You should now go and get some rest.
You should get this chance and enjoy yourself, you being too busy all this time

$Bishop Ignacio$
Hehe. Don't worry, and just leave. I should be thanking you for all of this.
You are the more talented adventurer of all I had every meet.

$Injured Elite$
Argh... *Gasp*...
(It seems like he is having trouble speaking because of a severe injury.)

$Bishop Ignacio$
The ritual is progressing smoothly, so don't worry, and just go and take care of Geraint.
Hehehe.

$Elite Soldier$
I still have 50 pages of letters of apologies left to write for the incident at Calderock.
I wonder when will we finish this?

$King Cassius$
D-did the ProphetHas the prophet wake up?
Is it because of my lack of Virtue? I doubt it is right

$Duke Stuart${action:Stand2}
We should train our young to have good virtueKing be known to the poor people who are shivering with anxiety, we should make good use of the Gold Dragon, as well as the Prophet.

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
Stop standing beside me!
You make me look bad. Hmph.

$General Douglas$
The situation with the injured soldiers is not getting any better.
Ithilien is providing much help, but I am worried because there is no perfect cure.

$Geraint$
{user_nick}...
What is it?

$Gerant$
Well... I am now getting somewhat used to the darkness.
It's just that I can't detect objects with my eyes. There aren't any other inconveniences.

$Geraint$
But there is one thing that is bothering me...
I can't feel it properly yet because it's so faint, but...
But this vague energy that I feel...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What kind of information could I get?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
I guess it's too soon to jump to conclusions, it would be better to judge when we had more information from people of Royal Castle.

$Bishop Ignacio$
I still waiting for a reportt, so go and hear about it from Elite Soldier.

$King Cassius$
*Sniff*... At times like this.... W-what, what can I do?
(He shivering alone with anxiety.)

$Duke Stuart$
Hmm... I can't believe there is another problem on top all the problems the kingdom is already facing. This is horrible.
(The Duke has a hopeless look.)

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
Sigh, I doubt there is ever a peaceful day in this Kingdom Hmph.
Well it isn't my responsibility, so I don't care!

$General Douglas${action:Talk}
I am currently receiving an urgent report.
Come back to me later.

$Elite Soldier${action:Talk}
There's a big problem! {user_nick}!
Have you heard the news?

$Elite Soldier$
An unidentified monster has appeared.
The scouts who went out after receiving the report have also been attacked, so they had to retreat without even getting to recover the injured soldiers!

$Elite Soldier$
That's right. After receiving the report, the Bishop has been looking for you, {user_nick}, to seek countermeasures. So hurry up and go to him right now!

$Geraint$
Anything would be fine.
If there were no problems, that would be fine, and if there were problems, then it wouldn't hurt to know about it.
(Talk to Elite Soldier.)

$Bishop Ignacio$
Oh welcome, {user_nick}, my true friend of Saint Haven. I was just going to call for you after receiving the report just now.
Saint Haven really needs your help for the new crisis it has met!

$Bishop Ignacio$
I have heard that an unidentified monster has appeared at Captain Darlant's Base, and has dealt severe injuries to the loyal soldiers of the kingdom.
The King is feeling greatly devastated from the sudden incident, and I also cannot help but grieve bitterly...

$Bishop Ignacio${action:Talk}
Oh, that's exactly what I was going to ask you to do.
Go to Captain Darlant's Base and find out the identity of the monster!

$King Cassius$
I have heard the n-news. So an evil monster has appeared and has tormented my people, right? At such times I should... I should... W-what should I do? What are the others saying? Are there any good ideas?

$Duke Stuart${action:talk}
The Black Dragon has just disappeared, and I can't believe another new monster has appeared.
It is really a chaotic world.

$Duke Stuart$
First, we should reassure the people that it is not a big deal. General Douglas, who is in charge of the defense of the capital, should be taking care of the monsters. Isn't that right?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>B-but if things aren't taken care of as soon as possible, then...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
An unidentified monster has appeared? It was probably just passing through Saint Haven. Its not my buisness i never call for it. If you would like to borrow the powers of us, Sorceresses, then bring a certificate from the King himself.

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
Shouldn't the General take care of it?! What did General Douglas say?
... Or maybe that Bishop over there, who is acting like he is solemn, will take care of it. Why are you always coming to me for things like this?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(General Douglas let out a big sigh.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$General Douglas$
I have heard the report!! An unidentified monster has been threatening the soldiers of Saint Haven, right?
Yet we do not have enough troops to dispatch immediately, beacuse of the great loss we had from the previous battle.

$General Douglas$
In such a situation, I think it would be best to follow Ignacio's suggestion.
(General Douglas is looking towards Bishop Ignacio.)

$Elite Soldier$
An unidentified monster has just appeared, and has attacked many soldiers. Many people have been injured. After receiving the report, Bishop Ignacio has been looking for you, {user_nick} , to seek countermeasures. So hurry up and go to him right now!!

$Bishop Ignacio$
Hurry up and go to Captain Darlant's Base to find out the identity of the monster.
Even if it has already escaped, there should be witnesses.

$Geraint$
A monster appeared? ... It had a familiar energy, but i do not remember.
It should be better to check it out. Please do this for me.

$Injured Soldier$
Arr... Argh...! A m-monster...! A giant monster...
It went that way!!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I will tell them. Take care of yourself first.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Injured Soldier$
*Pant pant*... I'm a-alright... Go to the Royal Castle with this news...!!
That a giant... That a giant Sea Monster has appeared... If they do not know soon, then...

$Geraint$
A Sea Monster? I see. Without a doubt, this was the same energy as the one from the other time...
... But how did it appear again...?

$Geraint$
What did the one who gave you the orders say?
You should try doing as he says.

$Bishop Ignacio$
So the identity of the monster was the evil Leviathan...
So that monster has created a great tidal wave, which has injured many and has demolished the troops...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Then the troops should be assembled and then...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
It's a beast that has disappeared 50 years ago by the Six Heroes.
I don't know what the reason may be, but I can't believe that the ferocious monster has returned...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But... We can't just sit back and watch, can we?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
I have sent an army, but it was useless. There has already been a great loss due to the fight against the Black Dragon, so the army is not strong enough to face Leviathan.

$Bishop Ignacio$
Of course we can't just do that.
If possible I would like to send the Clerics of the Order and the Court Sorceresses, but... As you may know, this is not something I can order independently on my own...

$Bishop Ignacio$
Well it seems like there's no choice but to ask help from him...

$Bishop Ignacio${action:Talk}
Who else would I be talking about besides Geraint?
A dragon is certainly the strongest existing life form. No matter how strong of a beast that Leviathan is, there is no way that it could beat a dragon.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>We need to let Geraint know about this first.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
I am aware of that. We don't have much choice too am i right?
Not only is there no guarantee that Leviatha could be defeated by the powers of human beings alone, but there is also no way of knowing how much damage this process will cause.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

$Injured Elite$
*Cough cough* Thank you.
(It looks like the Soldier cannot say much more. Hurry up and report to the Royal Castle.)
